text:
The ant script is looking for "no-slf4j" and "slf4j" folders under the "src"
directory. These folders must be created. But a more critical bug is that the
ant script can not find the ULogger interface. I believe this is because the
ULogger interface has been renamed as Logger. So the ant script can not build.
creator: borgacan@superonline.com

text: Which target?  [I just built log4j 1.3 head just fine.]
creator: jessh@ptc.com

text:
src/no-slf4j and src/slf4j which contain optional SLF4J support were not included in the distribution 
tarballs and zip files which caused builds from the distributions to fail.  Also eliminated separate 
compression step in generation of tarball (single step tar.gz has been in Ant for a couple of years).
creator: carnold@apache.org
